short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand or hide all (in)complete PoE challenges. This product isn't affiliated with or endorsed by Grinding Gear Games in any way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to better manage Challenges on the official Path of Exile website.
It adds new buttons that allow you to:
1. Hide/Show all complete challenges.
2. Hide/Show all incomplete challenges.
3. Expand/Collapse all complete challenges.
4. Expand/Collapse all incomplete challenges.
5. Hide/Show all complete sub-challenges (of incomplete challenges).
6. Hide/Show challenge number.
7. Enable pinning challenges.
